20101213222628.500|20101213222631.000|CCO|THEN IT GOT STRANGER ALL AROUND.
20101213222631.000|20101213222632.429|CCO|>> WELL, THEY HAVE -- THEY HAVE 
20101213222632.429|20101213222633.857|CCO|ASKED FOR GOOD RELATIONS IN 
20101213222633.857|20101213222635.286|CCO|RETURN.

20101213222636.714|20101213222638.143|CCO|RETURN.

20101213222639.571|20101213222641.000|CCO|FORTHRIGHT RESPONSE, ACTUALLY.

20101213223249.333|20101213223251.000|CCO|INVEST IN THEIR BUSINESSES AND 
20101213223251.000|20101213223252.667|CCO|PROPEL OUR ECONOMY FORWARD.
20101213223252.667|20101213223254.333|CCO|SO, I URGE THE HOUSE OF 
20101213223254.333|20101213223256.000|CCO|REPRESENTATIVES TO ACT QUICKLY 
20101213223256.000|20101213223257.667|CCO|ON THIS IMPORTANT MATTER.

20101213223259.333|20101213223301.000|CCO|CAN AGREE ON, IT'S THE URGENT

20101213223303.000|20101213223305.000|CCO|FAMILIES, REMOVING UNCERTAINTY 
20101213223305.000|20101213223307.000|CCO|FOR AMERICA'S BUSINESSES, AND 
20101213223307.000|20101213223309.000|CCO|GIVING OUR ECONOMY A BOOST AS WE
20101213223309.000|20101213223311.000|CCO|HEAD INTO THE NEW YEAR.
20101213223311.000|20101213223312.667|CCO|THANKS VERY MUCH, EVERYONE.
20101213223312.667|20101213223314.333|CCO|>> ALL RIGHT.
20101213223314.333|20101213223316.000|CCO|SO THERE IT IS.
20101213223316.000|20101213223317.667|CCO|A BRIEF STATEMENT FROM THE 
20101213223317.667|20101213223319.333|CCO|PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES.
20101213223319.333|20101213223321.000|CCO|MAKING THE CASE FOR THIS TAX 
20101213223321.000|20101213223322.429|CCO|DEAL HE WORKED OUT WITH THE 
20101213223322.429|20101213223323.857|CCO|REPUBLICANS, URGING SPEEDY 
20101213223323.857|20101213223325.286|CCO|PASSAGE.
20101213223325.286|20101213223326.714|CCO|I URGE THE HOUSE -- YOU SAW HIM 
20101213223326.714|20101213223328.143|CCO|SAY AT THE END TO ACT QUICKLY TO
20101213223328.143|20101213223329.571|CCO|HELP PROTECT MIDDLE CLASS 
20101213223329.571|20101213223331.000|CCO|FAMILIES.
20101213223331.000|20101213223332.667|CCO|HE DIDN'T GET INTO A WHOLE LOT 
20101213223332.667|20101213223334.333|CCO|OF THE CONTROVERSY.
20101213223334.333|20101213223336.000|CCO|JUST WANTED TO EXPRESS HIS 
20101213223336.000|20101213223337.667|CCO|PLEASURE THAT AT LEAST ON THE 
20101213223337.667|20101213223339.333|CCO|SENATE SIDE THEY HAVE OVERCOME 
20101213223339.333|20101213223341.000|CCO|THE PROCEDURAL HURDLE ALLOWING 
20101213223341.000|20101213223342.250|CCO|IT TO GO FORWARD OVERWHELMINGLY.
20101213223342.250|20101213223343.500|CCO|THE VOTE WAS RATHER LOPSIDED IN 
20101213223343.500|20101213223344.750|CCO|THE SENATE.
20101213223344.750|20101213223346.000|CCO|THERE COULD BE A DIFFERENT 
20101213223346.000|20101213223347.250|CCO|SITUATION IN THE HOUSE OF
